title: Poster, 1973
provenance: Acquired from dealers, galleries and auction houses by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
creditline: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
description: The image is divided in two major color fields: red, taking up three quarters of the area from the top, and white, taking up one quarter of the area from the bottom. The red "bleeds" into the white. Centered at quarter length from top is a high-contrast image of a man and woman, in black, white, magenta, and red. Inscriptions are in yellow letters: "Rainer W. Fassbinders / Die Zartlichkeit der Wolfe" on red, followed by credits in the white field.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, 1973.
1973. Offset lithograph on wove paper. Gift of Sara and Marc Benda. 2010-21-15.
